name: EquiMagic - Galashow of Horses
description: Magnificent horses and glittering costumes. Become a star in the Galashow of horses. Unique Horseshow Simulation with breathtaking horse dressage, grandiose costumes and stage sets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible, 128 bzw. 256 MB RAM, Pixel Shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1000 MB available space
